name: Candy Egg Sugar: Easter Adventures
description:
Billy and Berry the Easter Bunnies need your help! The eggs are scattered all over the countryside, the sheep have escaped, and someone needs to deliver the eggs!

In this Easter-themed sequel to Candy Cane Sugar, match the eggs, donuts and other sweet treats to beat the score goals. Avoid carrots and falling blockers, helped along by exploding chicks and sheep in this fun casual game.

There are three goal targets: activate the first star to avoid losing; activate the third to win the level. When you have completed the story, relax in the Zen Garden for endless play.

Programming: Jo Weber

Music: Andrew Sitkov

SoundFX: SunnySideSound, Retainna, Soughtaftersounds @ Freesound

Tutorials, additional resources: Wilmer Lin, James Doyle

Art: Ricimi Designs, Poneti, Rafmanix, Visual Pharm
